settings.faq_answer:
• To qualify, you must be 18 years or older, and have a valid (shipping) address in a participating region.

  • Winners need to provide proof of age and residence.

  • The official competition can only be entered on social media, by following the entry mechanics mentioned in the campaign post.

  • To enter: follow @inapaarmanskitchen and @alvisdriftwine and tag three friends.

  • Multiple entries per person/household are permitted.

  • Employees and immediate family members of the companies associated with the competition are ineligible to participate.

• The competition ends at 23:59 on 28 February 2025.

  • The winner will be drawn at random, and notified via DM on Tuesday, 5 March 2025. The winner will also be announced via social media post.

  • By participating in the competition, winners consent to have their identities disclosed and potentially used in future promotional material or publications for Alvi’s Drift or Ina Paarman.

• 1 x Main Prize:
    A box of Alvi's Drift Sparkling Brut Rosé, champagne glasses, an ice bucket, a picnic basket and blanket, and all the Ina Paarman products required for our February menu.

  • 5 x Runner-Up Prizes:
    Ina Paarman’s products required for the February recipes, plus two bottles of Alvi’s Drift Sparkling Brut Rosé.

  • Prizes are non-transferable and non-exchangeable for cash or other forms of credit.
